author: Axios
title: India announces nationwide lockdown to stop spread of coronavirus
description: India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced on Tuesday that the entire country will be locked down for three weeks beginning at midnight in an effort to stop the spread of the coronavirus. Why it matters: With 1.3 billion people, India is the second-most p…
content:
India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced on Tuesday that the entire country will be locked down for three weeks beginning at midnight in an effort to stop the spread of the coronavirus.
